creator: RailYatri: Trains & IntrCity Buses for travelers
descriptionHtml:
Book India’s first SmartBus for Intercity travel.

Top 3 reasons to book a smartBus for your next trip are: On-time performance, Safety promise and Personalized Assistance.

IntrCity Smart Bus is India’s 1st fleet of branded buses with a pan India presence. We make bus travel dependable and stress-free with our clean and branded buses, professional drivers & staff, in-bus toilets, high-speed Wifi and lots more.

Key Highlights of IntrCity SmartBus App

1.) Online Bus Ticket Booking
- Easily book IntrCity smart Bus ticket using the app in few taps.
- Online booking helps you to pick and choose seats, preferred time and boarding location.

2.) On Time Performance
- SmartBus trips start on time. Our staff and our bus is ready 60 minutes before the trip begins.

3.) Safety Promise
- Our 24x7 Command centre monitors every SmartBus so as to avoid any breakdown. We also have CCTV and GPS tracking on buses to help command centre keep a close watch and help the journey safe.

4) Personalized Assistance
- Our boarding crew helps you check-in and our Bus Captain assists you during the journey


5) Features to help you during the trip:
- Bus Captain: A trained Bus captain would assist you during the trip for a hasslefree travel.
- Washrooms on buses: 85% of IntrCity SmartBuses have washrooms u
- Spacious seats with ample leg room
- Cosy sleepers with clean blankets & bed sheets
- Free mineral water bottle
- High speed Wifi
- GPS Tracking

IntrCity SmartBus service is available on below popular routes.
New Delhi <-> Lucknow
New Delhi <-> Kanpur
Amritsar <-> New Delhi
New Delhi <-> Manali
New Delhi <-> Shimla
Bangalore <-> Chennai
Bangalore <-> Hyderabad
Bangalore <-> Coimbatore
Chennai <-> Coimbatore
Chennai <-> Hyderabad
Mumbai <-> Ahmedabad
Chennai <-> Madurai
Bangalore <-> Madurai
Hyderabad <-> Mumbai
Bangalore <-> Vijaywada
Delhi <-> Gorakhpur
Mumbai <-> Goa
Chennai <-> Vijaywada
Pune <-> Hyderabad
Hyderabad <-> Tirupati

*Important Note* - This app would require your Email Id and will store it on its servers for sending you IntrCity SmartBus tickets, Invoices, and updates on new IntrCity SmartBus features.

title: IntrCity SmartBus App: Book Intercity Bus Tickets

creator: RailYatri: Trains & IntrCity Buses for travelers
descriptionHtml:
Book India’s first SmartBus for safe inter-city travel

Top 4 reasons to book a smartBus for your next trip are: Private cabins, regular sanitization of buses, safe boarding lounges and health insurance cover.

IntrCity Smart Bus is India’s 1st fleet of branded buses with a pan India presence. We make bus travel hygienic and safe with our clean and sanitised buses, professional drivers & trained bus crew, sanitized in-bus toilets and 24x7 support center.

Key Highlights of IntrCity SmartBus App

Private Cabins
Private cabins for single and double occupancy
Travellers can travel in a safe & secure space

Sanitisation of buses
- Regular cleaning and sanitisation of all buses.
- All high contact touch points in bus undergo deep cleaning and sanitisation.

Safe boarding lounges
- Travellers can wait inside clean lounges, away from contamination.
- With ample seating inside the lounge, strict social distancing will be followed.

Traveller Health Insurance
- Traveller’s safety is our priority, we offer health & accidental insurance which covers every IntrCity traveller.

Features to help you during the trip:
- IntrCity App communication support - 24x7 communication both via support center and IntrCity mobile app
- Fully sanitized in-bus washrooms
- Spacious seats - encouraging social distancing
- Private cabins - both individual and family travellers can travel in safe & secure space
- Traveller thermal screening and KYC process
- RY wallet cash - 100% refund on cancellation
- Free mineral water bottle
- High speed Wifi
- GPS Tracking

IntrCity SmartBus service is available on below popular routes.
Delhi to Lucknow
Lucknow to Delhi
Delhi to Kanpur
Kanpur to Delhi
Noida to Lucknow
Lucknow to Noida
Greater Noida to Lucknow
Lucknow to Greater Noida
Amritsar to Delhi
Delhi to Amritsar
Delhi to Manali
Manali to Delhi

*Important Note* - This app would require your Email Id and will store it on its servers for sending you IntrCity SmartBus tickets, Invoices, and updates on new IntrCity SmartBus features.

container.value: RailYatri: Trains & IntrCity Buses for travelers

creator: RailYatri: Trains & IntrCity Buses for travelers
descriptionHtml:
Book India’s first SmartBus for safe inter-city travel

Top 4 reasons to book a smartBus for your next trip are: Private cabins, regular sanitization of buses, safe boarding lounges and health insurance cover.

IntrCity Smart Bus is India’s 1st fleet of branded buses with a pan India presence. We make bus travel hygienic and safe with our clean and sanitised buses, professional drivers & trained bus crew, sanitized in-bus toilets and 24x7 support center.

Key Highlights of IntrCity SmartBus App

Private Cabins
Private cabins for single and double occupancy
Travellers can travel in a safe & secure space

Sanitisation of buses
- Regular cleaning and sanitisation of all buses.
- All high contact touch points in bus undergo deep cleaning and sanitisation.

Safe boarding lounges
- Travellers can wait inside clean lounges, away from contamination.
- With ample seating inside the lounge, strict social distancing will be followed.

Traveller Health Insurance
- Traveller’s safety is our priority, we offer health & accidental insurance which covers every IntrCity traveller.

Features to help you during the trip:
- IntrCity App communication support - 24x7 communication both via support center and IntrCity mobile app
- Fully sanitized in-bus washrooms
- Spacious seats - encouraging social distancing
- Private cabins - both individual and family travellers can travel in safe & secure space
- Traveller thermal screening and KYC process
- RY wallet cash - 100% refund on cancellation
- Free mineral water bottle
- High speed Wifi
- GPS Tracking

IntrCity SmartBus service is available on below popular routes.
Delhi to Lucknow
Lucknow to Delhi
Delhi to Kanpur
Kanpur to Delhi
Amritsar to Delhi
Delhi to Amritsar
Delhi to Manali
Manali to Delhi
Hyderabad to Vishakhapatnam

Bangalore to Pondicherry
Pondicherry to Bangalore
Guntur to Vizag
Vizag to Guntur

Follow IntrCity on Instagram

creator: RailYatri: Trains & IntrCity Buses for travelers
descriptionHtml:
Book India’s first SmartBus for safe inter-city travel

Top 4 reasons to book a smartBus for your next trip are: Private cabins, regular sanitization of buses, safe boarding lounges and health insurance cover.

IntrCity Smart Bus is India’s 1st fleet of branded buses with a pan India presence. We make bus travel hygienic and safe with our clean and sanitised buses, professional drivers & trained bus crew, sanitized in-bus toilets and 24x7 support center.

Key Highlights of IntrCity SmartBus App

Private Cabins
Private cabins for single and double occupancy
Travellers can travel in a safe & secure space

Sanitisation of buses
- Regular cleaning and sanitisation of all buses.
- All high contact touch points in bus undergo deep cleaning and sanitisation.

Safe boarding lounges
- Travellers can wait inside clean lounges, away from contamination.
- With ample seating inside the lounge, strict social distancing will be followed.

Traveller Health Insurance
- Traveller’s safety is our priority, we offer health & accidental insurance which covers every IntrCity traveller.

Features to help you during the trip:
- IntrCity App communication support - 24x7 communication both via support center and IntrCity mobile app
- Fully sanitized in-bus washrooms
- Spacious seats - encouraging social distancing
- Private cabins - both individual and family travellers can travel in safe & secure space
- Traveller thermal screening and KYC process
- RY wallet cash - 100% refund on cancellation
- Free mineral water bottle
- High speed Wifi
- GPS Tracking

title: Book Bus Tickets Online: IntrCity SmartBus App

creator: RailYatri: Trains & IntrCity Buses for travelers
descriptionHtml:
Book India’s first SmartBus for safe intercity travel

Top reasons to book a smartBus for your next trip are: Safety with 5 step sanitization, Private cabins on bus, Trained crew with Captain, Washrooms On-board, Private cabins.

IntrCity Smart Bus is India’s 1st fleet of branded buses with a pan India presence. We use modern technology to ensure your comfort and peace of mind during travel. We have made bus travel hygienic and safe with our clean and sanitised buses, professional drivers & trained bus crew, sanitized in-bus toilets and 24x7 support center.

Key Highlights of IntrCity SmartBus App

Safety & Reliability
Regular Sanitization of Buses
Safe boarding through IntrCity lounges or assisted boarding points.
Trained crew with captain on-board to ensure authorized entry and assist for anything during the travel.
24x7 Control room monitoring of buses.
Trained and Authorized Drivers.

Washrooms on-board
- Most of our buses have Washrooms on-board
- Please note that few routes, especially going to hilly regions like (Delhi to Manali) have restrictions. Please check before you book for Washroom sign on the bus listing.
- Additionally, there are sometimes restrictions on using the washroom within the city.

Private Cabins
Private cabins for single and double occupancy
Travellers can travel in a safe & secure space
Seat recommendation engine to recommend seats suited for your needs

On Time Travel
Our buses have taken over 1 million rides with 98.4% of them starting and reaching as per the given schedule.

Complete Transparency
We share complete list of route and travel stops before the journey
Captains are also accessible during the journey and through the IntrCity app for any help.

Traveller Health Insurance
- Traveller’s safety is our priority, we offer health & accidental insurance which covers every IntrCity traveller.

Features to help you during the trip on IntrCity App:
- Live Bus Tracking
- OTP To be shown before you board
- Talking to the Captain / Crew.
- Lost & Found

Offers for you
- You can use the WELCOME coupon code to get 15% off upto Rs. 75 on your first travel.
- Please check the Offer section within the app or coupon section to avail more offers.
- SmartBus SavingsCard also gives you Rs. 150 off on every trip. This is availed by 50% of our users and has helped them save upto Rs. 900.

So Booking your tickets on IntrCity SmartBus and travel worry free. We are waiting to welcome you on-board.

title: Book Bus Tickets Online: IntrCity SmartBus App

creator: RailYatri: Trains & IntrCity Buses for travelers
descriptionHtml:
Book India’s first SmartBus for safe intercity travel

Top reasons to book a smartBus for your next trip are: Safety with 5 step sanitization, Private cabins on bus, Trained crew with Captain, Washrooms On-board, Private cabins.

IntrCity Smart Bus is India’s 1st fleet of branded buses with a pan India presence. We use modern technology to ensure your comfort and peace of mind during travel. We have made bus travel hygienic and safe with our clean and sanitised buses, professional drivers & trained bus crew, sanitized in-bus toilets and 24x7 support center.

Key Highlights of IntrCity SmartBus App

Safety & Reliability
Regular Sanitization of Buses
Safe boarding through IntrCity lounges or assisted boarding points.
Trained crew with captain on-board to ensure authorized entry and assist for anything during the travel.
24x7 Control room monitoring of buses.
Trained and Authorized Drivers.

Washrooms on-board
- Most of our buses have Washrooms on-board
- Please note that few routes, especially going to hilly regions like (Delhi to Manali) have restrictions. Please check before you book for Washroom sign on the bus listing.
- Additionally, there are sometimes restrictions on using the washroom within the city.

Private Cabins
Private cabins for single and double occupancy
Travellers can travel in a safe & secure space
Seat recommendation engine to recommend seats suited for your needs

On Time Travel
Our buses have taken over 1 million rides with 98.4% of them starting and reaching as per the given schedule.

Complete Transparency
We share complete list of route and travel stops before the journey
Captains are also accessible during the journey and through the IntrCity app for any help.

Traveller Health Insurance
- Traveller’s safety is our priority, we offer health & accidental insurance which covers every IntrCity traveller.

Features to help you during the trip on IntrCity App:
- Live Bus Tracking
- OTP To be shown before you board
- Talking to the Captain / Crew.
- Lost & Found

Offers for you
- You can use the WELCOME coupon code to get 15% off upto Rs. 75 on your first travel.
- Please check the Offer section within the app or coupon section to avail more offers.
- SmartBus SavingsCard also gives you Rs. 150 off on every trip. This is availed by 50% of our users and has helped them save upto Rs. 900.

So Booking your tickets on IntrCity SmartBus and travel worry free. We are waiting to welcome you on-board.

IntrCity SmartBus service is available on the below popular routes.
Delhi to Lucknow

creator: RailYatri - IRCTC Authorized Partner, IntrCity Bus
descriptionHtml:
IntrCity SmartBus is India’s 1st fleet of branded buses with a pan-India presence for intercity travel. We ensure hygienic and safe travel with our clean and sanitized buses, professional drivers & trained bus crew. You can book buses online via our app or our website - www.intrcity.com

Key Highlights

Safety & Reliability
-Regularly Sanitized Buses
-Safe boarding via IntrCity lounges or assisted boarding points
-Trained crew to assist for anything during the travel
-24x7 Control room monitoring of buses
-Trained and Authorized Drivers
-Women friendly

On-board Washrooms
On-board Washrooms on most buses
(Please note that few routes like Delhi to Manali have restrictions. Check for Washroom sign while booking.)

Private Cabins
Safe & secure space for travelers as single and double occupancy
Seat recommendation engine for your specific needs

On Time Travel
1 million rides with 98.4% punctuality

Complete Transparency
Route and stops shared before the journey
Accessibility of captains during the journey and through the IntrCity app

Traveler Health Insurance
Free insurance of Rs 1 Lakh for every IntrCity SmartBus traveller

Features to help you during the trip:
-Live Bus Tracker
-OTP Verification
-Crew Assistance
-Lost & Found
-Customer support

Offers for you
-Get Upto Rs. 250 Off on your first booking, use code BUS250
-SmartBus Savings Card also gives Rs.140 off on every trip, helps saves up to Rs.560 (Availed by 50% of our users)
-Refer and earn free rides
-Free online bus booking app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's new in this app version?
1. Introducing SmartSwitch. Conveniently switch to any SmartBus, time, seat, boarding and dropping point after your booking

4. Easy search with Boarding Points
5. The advance booking limit has been increased to 180 days
6. UI improvements and bug fixes
